Statute.Title: Canada — United States Enhanced Tax Information Exchange Agreement Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord Canada — Etats-Unis pour un meilleur échange de renseignements fiscaux, Loi de mise en oeuvre de l’)

General.Text: General, 2014, c. 20, s. 6(2) (Minister of Finance, publication of notices)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2014, c. 20, s. 99 (assent: 19.06.2014), ss. 1 to 6 in force 27.06.2014 (entry into force of the Agreement) see Canada Gazette, Part I, 23.08.2014, p. 2234.
